project.name: C-C129B-GIMP-08-ST03-DT07-DF12-CF19-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C129B-GIMP-08-ST03-DT07-DF12-CF19-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved jpg file Good input:1) environment variable contains only alphanumeric charactersBad input:1) environment variable contains non alphanumeric characters

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT
